sentences.translation: I brush my teeth every day.

sentences.simplifiedText: 早上起床后，我会先刷牙，然后洗脸，再洗头发。
sentences.traditionalText: 早上起床後，我會先刷牙，然後洗臉，再洗頭髮。
sentences.pinyin: Zǎoshang qǐchuáng hòu, wǒ huì xiān shuā yá, ránhòu shuā liǎn, zài shuā tóufǎ.
sentences.translation: After getting up in the morning, I will first brush my teeth, then wash my face, and then brush my hair.

sentences.simplifiedText: 为了让房子看起来更亮丽，他花了整个下午时间刷墙。
sentences.traditionalText: 為了讓房子看起來更亮麗，他花了整個下午時間刷牆。
sentences.pinyin: Wèile ràng fángzi kàn qǐlái gèng liànglì, tā huāle zhěnggè xiàwǔ shíjiān shuā qiáng.
sentences.translation: In order to make the house look brighter, he spent the whole afternoon daubing the wall.

sentences.simplifiedText: 我昨天因为头疼，所以决定刷课并休息一天。
sentences.traditionalText: 我昨天因為頭疼，所以決定刷課並休息一天。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ zuótiān yīnwèi tóuténg, suǒyǐ juédìng shuā kè bìng xiūxí yītiān.
sentences.translation: I decided to skip class and rest for a day because of a headache yesterday.
